title: @Meddler, I have a cookie for you. Come and get it.
body:
[](http://hotheadburritos.com/data/_uploaded/image/menu/Hot-Head-Burritos-Chocolate-Chip-Cookie.png)

http://soulfullysweet.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/05/crop-oatmeal-cookie.jpg
#HAH IT WAS RAISIN OATMEAL ALL ALONG.

...You can still have it, though. Thanks for everything you've done for us.

######(Please upvote for visibility so Meddler-senpai notices me)

EDIT: Meddler, you're running out of time. The offer is still up, but soon that cookie will be claimed by this thing:
https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/originals/18/f5/98/18f59877c244d9c03b442d9ea66ffd0a.jpg

You better hurry, man.

replies.body: I feel like a heretic but I prefer oatmeal raisin to chocolate chip.

You monster. 
https://danceswithfat.files.wordpress.com/2011/06/cookie-monster-truvia.png
Its ironic how you are calling him a monster with a picture of the **actual** **_cookie monster_**
Did someone say heresy?
Raisin Sun is proof of your Heresy.
{{champion:89}} praisIN the Sun!
But you need the sun to make raisins...
I prefer oatmeal chocolate chip personally
that's good too
same here

Thank you, really appreciate the thought even if it does appear to be highly lacking in chocolate ;).

And sorry for the slow response, I generally stick to the Gameplay side of the boards so can sometimes be blind to stuff in other sections. 

Also, that cookie monster art's kinda terrifying, gonna be honest.

Thanks, I baked it myself with love, affection, and ~~murder~~ sugar.

Although, if I could be so privy to ask, what IS your favorite type of cookie?
Generally I'm just an old school cookie with big lumps of chocolate kind of guy. Occasional guilty pleasure appreciation for M&M cookies too though.

Did you just say you have the same cookie preference as me?

Meddler, can I... can I add you?

> [{quoted}](name=Melledoneus,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=fc9Z2inc,comment-id=000e000000000000,timestamp=2016-07-13T04:25:56.605+0000)
>
> Did you just say you have the same cookie preference as me?
> 
> Meddler, can I... can I add you?

Liking chocolate chunk cookies and the occasional M&M cookie is not uncommon in America. It's only the oreo heretics that have caused a change in the status quo.
You have oreo cookies? That does sound not so pleasant.

> [{quoted}](name=BloodyTompon,realm=OCE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=fc9Z2inc,comment-id=000e00000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-07-13T10:46:16.678+0000)
>
> You have oreo cookies? That does sound not so pleasant.

Yep.
Orea cookies some sort of unholy abomination.
Malicious Metal flavored cookies? Let the Hueing begin.
M&M cookies < MM cookies
We have cookies Meddler. All kinds of cookies, chocolate, blueberry, every cookie you can imagine.
http://i.imgur.com/njqFaVY.png

You monster!
https://66.media.tumblr.com/05c8381cee20313f4e186e446f1d1460/tumblr_nx5wmqHhf01ta9suso1_500.gif

https://media2.giphy.com/media/sZDPNsiMeGgrC/200_s.gif

Why, thank you.

Funny thing was that the cookie in the thumbnail was a chocolate chip cookie. So it wasn't a raisin oatmeal cookie ALL ALONG.

It was once a chocolate chip cookie. I swear it was. You liar.
You're imagining things.
Check both pictures.
Nope, nothing there, heh heh heh..

How do you make a thumbnail the chocolate chip and the board pic raisain oatmeal?

Serious question, is it a bored feature or...?

Go to the bottom toolbar. Mouse over "insert a link."

Insert the link, but don't add anything to the brackets.

Congrats, you just made an invisible image. Not that we already have enough of those threads going around already.
https://i.imgflip.com/xkma1.jpg

Nooooooooo-

Wait a second, I can just post an image of a happy Ruby.

http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/rwby/images/2/24/Ruby_happy.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20121231013740

There we go!

Gunna need milk with those cookies

https://encrypted-tbn1.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcQoN9s7jZ0LeUopxtmZKIuI-f1V_86cMsvdLLznpr-QzRpE86gYCg

I'm lactose intolerant, so I'd rather make a cookie sandwich.

With cookies.
LPT (lactose pro tip) when lactose intolerent you can always replace milk with cookies to create the classic cookies and cookies combo
http://i.imgur.com/CNygp3J.gif
I actually prefer oatmeal over choclate chip, sue me
raisin cookies are delicious

At first, I was skeptical there was going to be a real cookie.
Oh, how wrong I was.

That second image. 

Should not have clicked that.... SOOOO should NOT have clicked that. o.o
Seeing this comment forced me to click it. Know that I, a random stranger on the internet, blame you.

Lmao. I am so sorry.

That being said, you just made my day, good sir. XD
god damn that looks delicious
Oatmeal Rasin is my favorite cookie, jokes on you
http://img.ifcdn.com/images/b42212b0b0e97a68e3afb56e4a0130730bb48be906d8461ad0986a1f453c7378_1.jpg
sugar cookies are the only cookies that even move meddler
http://i.imgur.com/9KCIeJi.gif
https://i.ytimg.com/vi/jfwz0jsvBaQ/maxresdefault.jpg
Y not?
